title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 250.8 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 250.8 - Public notice

State Regulations

All procurements by State agencies in excess of $15,000
shall be advertised in the State's Procurement Opportunities Newsletter in
accordance with article 4-C of the Economic Development Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
250.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
